channel.title: How to make equipment stat check work on bluurs client
channel.description:
Hey i want to make it so when i click equpment stats check it works on bluurs client and deltascape source
But for some reason when i click equipment stats it dont work
Can you please give me the code and do i place it in my server files or the client files? And what .java?
Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 07:11:07 am[/size][hr]If no one knows then fine?
